item.title: Gold, lithium found in Karnataka forests, pressure on to give clearance
item.description:
<![CDATA[BENGALURU: The state Mines and Geology Department has prepared a list of 65 locations where the study and exploration for gold and other rare earth minerals is happening. Large quantities of gold and lithium have been found in Koppal and Raichur. But extraction and detailed research has been stalled as the areas fall under protected forests.
â€œFor the first time and in a rare case, we found 12-14 gm of gold per tonne in Amrapur block of Koppal district. Usually during studies and mining, it is a...]]>
item.author: Bosky Khanna
